Then that woman who had advised him also became one of his spirits, “It’s me, I’m Woman Spirit”. Then also someone said inside him “It’s me, I’m Herring Spirit”. Then again to him also it was speaking inside him “It’s me, I’m Seagull Spirit”. Then again to him it said inside him “It’s me, I’m the Salmon People’s Canoe Spirit”. Then his father went up to him.
